item.title: Brooke Shields and Kate Moss to cast a model who deviates from the size standard
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
It’s kind of confusing because I’m a bigger girl, Dalbesio says. I’m not the biggest girl on the market but I’m definitely bigger than all the girls [Calvin Klein] has ever worked with, so that is really intimidating. She wasn’t sure, she said of the shoot there live the blind texts

1. Image with share buttons

[share][/share] It’s kind of confusing because I’m a bigger girl, Dalbesio says. I’m not the biggest girl on the market but I’m definitely bigger than all the girls [Calvin Klein] has ever worked with, so that is really intimidating. She wasn’t sure, she said of the shoot, what was expected from her in terms of her size or shape.

Refreshingly, what was expected of her was the same thing that was expected of Lara Stone: to take a beautiful picture.

Calvin Klein known for launching the careers of such svelte models as Brooke Shields and Kate Moss to cast a model who deviates from the size standard and make a fuss about it to Dalbesio who spent years. She wasn’t sure, she said of the shoot, what was expected from her in terms of her size or shape has ever worked with, so that is really intimidating.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: That will happen when you wake up two hours earlier for a month
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
Some of the most successful people in the world wake up early. I’m not talking about regular time. I mean so early that the average person is still fast asleep.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] Sure, each one of us is different – the important thing is to find a routine; find what works for your unique internal body clock.There are many benefits to rising earlier. So, if you are playing around with your sleep routine to see what works or if you want to push yourself out of your comfort zone, why not rise a couple of hours earlier to see what happens. [ad type=custom-ad-2] You’ll have more quality time to yourself if you wake-up earlier, free of distractions. In the early hours of the morning, no one is bothering you. People are asleep. Facebook is asleepYou can dedicate your time and energy to activities that benefit you. Whether it be reading, writing, exercising or any other soul-fulfilling activity.You’ll have more time to exercise.

Vimeo responsive video player

[share]https://vimeo.com/channels/staffpicks/167433178[/share] Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude. Positive anything is better than negative nothing.

YouTube responsive video player

[share]https://youtu.be/A_RPOmUb_Bk[/share] Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude. Positive anything is better than negative nothing. . [ad type=custom-ad-2] There are so many lessons I wish I had learned while I was young enough to appreciate and apply them. The thing with wisdom, and often with life lessons in general, is that they’re learned in retrospect, long after we needed them. The good news is that other people can benefit from our experiences and the lessons we’ve learned. Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude. Positive anything is better than negative nothing. It’s up to you to improve your outlook on life, and on the world in general. In doing so, you’ll put yourself in a better position to make the world a better place. It takes energy to not get frustrated by the negative we see in the world. It can leave you exhausted if you pay too much attention to it.

item.title: Spending quality time together is very important
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
A strong family finds that opportunities for quality time emerge from quantity time: The more time you spend together, the better chance you have of sharing quality experiences. Eating meals together, talking about the events of the day, sharing joys and defeats.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] Doing household chores together and spending some evenings popping corn and watching movies are examples of shared activities. Some families even schedule one evening every week for special family activities. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Doing things a child or spouse wants to do also sends a strong message of love. It’s a good idea to identify the things family members want to do together. In my family, we spend our summers showing goats together. Every weekend we pack up the coolers, show equipment, children and goats, and we head to the next show.

item.title: Cyclone Vardah: Several dead as storm lashes Indian coast
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
At least seven people have been killed and thousands evacuated from coastal areas in two southern Indian states, as Cyclone Vardah lashed Chennai (Madras).

Schools and businesses were shut and airport services suspended, as the cyclone made landfall with heavy rain and winds of up to 140km/h (85mph).

It is best to approach your vacation looking forward to all there is ahead rather than pining in advance for the loss of your internet access. item.title: The past two decades has seen a massive growth in the number
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
When US rappers start wearing wellies as a fashion statement you know the rubber footwear has come a long way from the farmers' field. They are available in every colour and pattern imaginable, sold in every shop imaginable and worn by everyone imaginable - including said rapper Nicki Minaj.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] Studies have shown that staying mentally stimulated can slow the progress of (or possibly even prevent) Alzheimer’s and Dementia, since keeping your brain active and engaged prevents it from losing power. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Just like any other muscle in the body, the brain requires exercise to keep it strong and healthy, so the phrase - use it or lose it - is particularly apt when it comes to your mind. Doing puzzles and playing games such as chess have also been found to be helpful with cognitive stimulation. No matter how much stress you have at work, in your personal relationships, or countless other issues faced in daily life, it all just slips away when you lose yourself in a great story.

item.title: Realistic life hacks for saving money on your wardrobe
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
There are so many articles out there telling you how to save money and cut corners. However, half the time the advice is so altruistic it would take you months, if not years, to completely change how you interact with the world.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] Don’t get me wrong! It’s good advice, but it’s just unrealistic - especially for a lot of us who are living in a big city and need to pay for rent, internet, food, transportation, insurance, etc. where anything leftover goes to keeping our sanity for one more week. [ad type=custom-ad-2] The other half of the advice is such small changes that it would take an equally long amount of time to nickel and dime your way to making your rent payments. While storing the old change you found in your car and couch can amount to something, someday - it’s not going to help you in the short term.

[share][/share] A great canon of lore built up around these "wee folk" (who were often not actually very little!). Mythologists have tended to study the pantheons of great gods and goddesses who's adventures were chronicled in epic legends.But, the average person interacted with the smaller, more local spirits who surrounded their home, land, and the wilds. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Lore surrounding these Wee Folk also survived as living folklore for centuries after conversion to Christianity, when mythologies of the large scale deities were stamped out. These small spirits represent remnants of the old religion that carried on at local level. The existence of supernatural fairy-like beings was believed by virtually everyone across the social strata until the birth of science during the age of enlightenment.

item.title: New York City taxi medallions bringing huge returns
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
Since their 1937 introduction in New York City by former Mayor Fiorello H. LaGuardia, taxi medallions have risen steadily to become one of the most valuable commodities currently available in the American marketplace. Far exceeding gains of the NASDAQ, which is up 22 percent year-over-year, the S&P 500, up 21 percent, and the Dow, up 18 percent, the price of these coveted medallions jumped 49 percent in the last 12 months.

item.title: Man charged after train attack at Forest Hill train station
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
A 38-year-old has been charged with attempted murder after a man was attacked at an Overground station in south-east London.

Adrian Brown, of Brockley Rise, Forest Hill, was arrested after a man in his 40s was assaulted on a train at Forest Hill station at 13:20 GMT on Monday. He was also charged with possession of an offensive weapon and assault by battery.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] It’s funny how that happens, isn’t it? The musical double take.It made me wonder if there are other songs that have the power to do that. More importantly, what lessons can they teach? Here are a few of those songs.You can’t always get what you want - The Rolling Stones. [ad type=custom-ad-2] The words in “Beautiful” gave a generation hope when there seemingly wasn't any. They taught our youth what it actually meant to be beautiful.Beautiful – Christina Aguilera. Michael kindly reminds us that changing the world starts in only one place. You.Man in the Mirror – Michael Jackson.

item.title: The American technology business are headed to meet the president
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
He won’t need to serve any lunch - there’s already more than enough beef to go around. Throughout his campaign to be elected president, Mr Trump put technology companies and their executives in the firing line, with calls for boycotts and accusations of tax-dodging. And with tax and immigration reform at the heart of his plans in the White House, there could be ample scope for fireworks between the leader-to-be and Silicon Valley’s most-powerful.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] But, there’s something about early mornings that a few extra hours sleep can’t compete with. Even if you decide to go back to bed afterwards, just being there to see the day break is something special.The gift of witnessing the earth opening its eyelids is like no other. [ad type=custom-ad-2] It’s a humbling, reassuring, blissful experience. In fact, there’s no better time to simply just “be”, to reside in nature’s palm and feel a part of it all.

item.title: Ways to protect your baby from common safety hazards
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
Becoming a parent surely is one of the absolute highlights of the human experience. Your world starts revolving around your newly-formed family and the happiness that you feel during this time of your life is immense.Keeping your baby safe is a challenging job, no doubt about it.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] There are many different child safety hazards, and most parents tend to overlook some potentially dangerous situations. Inside or outside of your home, you can never be too cautious. I am not trying to make you paranoid or fearful, just more aware of these harmful possibilities. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Don’t get too stressed about this; I assure you that peace of mind is possible and that your parenting ‘career’ will be even more joyful by taking care of the following hazards. Here are a few potential dangers that you’ll face during the growth of your baby and simple, yet effective solutions for them.

item.title: Introducing diversity in online language analysis
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
For the past 30 years, computer science researchers have been teaching their machines to read, for example, assigning back issues of the Wall Street Journal, so computers can learn the English they need to run search engines like Google or mine platforms like Facebook and Twitter for opinions and marketing data. But using only standard English has left out whole segments of society who use dialects and non-standard varieties of English, and the omission is increasingly problematic,

item.title: Attention Christmas is the best time of year
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
I am not a fan of cold weather. I tend to chase the forecast when I can, and find sanctuary in the warmth of the sun. Yet, I am keenly aware of how damn happy this time of year makes me. There is a reason why “it's the most wonderful time of year.”

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] It is not the presents. I am 28 years old, and the thrill of writing a Christmas list left me quite a while ago. It is not the time off, though, working in education and getting a whole week off is pretty sweet. It is not that everyone is a little bit kinder this time of year - they aren't. Black friday is turning more and more into The hunger games. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Still, I get excited the first time I walk through a store and see Christmas decorations and trees on display . Every year, I find myself counting down the days until my local radio station begins to play non-stop Christmas music. And, to every single one of you out there who still believes, I hope you all have yourself a merry little Christmas.

item.title: Stay safe and increase your privacy on the internet
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
Internet freedom is a concept that many people take for granted. It feels so commonplace that many forget how easy it is for that freedom to result in a loss of privacy or worse. As the internet becomes even more entangled with everyday life.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] It is not enough to trust websites, browsers, and internet service providers to do it for you. In fact, you should not trust them because their default privacy settings are lacking to say the least. As an empowered internet user, it is your responsibility to take as much control of your privacy as you can. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Here are five ways to do just that:change your browser settings,change your social media settings,add two-factor authentication,install software protection,keep your software up to date. As an empowered internet user, it is your responsibility to take as much control of your privacy as you can.

item.title: Volcanoes erupting now is greater than the 20th century's
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
Is the number of volcanic eruptions worldwide increasing? Yes. During the 20th century, there were a total of 3,542 volcanic eruptions globally. That works out to approximately 35 eruptions per year. That may sound like a lot, but according to Volcano Discovery there are 36 volcanoes erupting around the world right now.

[ad type=custom-ad-2] That begs the question—is black henna safe? Black henna is a mix of real henna and modern chemicals. This new invention isn’t regulated and doesn’t have the track record of its natural companion. It contains something called para-phenylenediaime. Both artists and recipients are at risk from using this.

item.title: Does your journey to work break the limits of commuting
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
No matter how much transport systems improve, the average time we spend commuting stays the same – it’s called Maretti’s constant. Nobody likes commuting – and with good reason. A 2014 study that looked at the well-being of commuters in the US found that people’s happiness and overall sense of satisfaction with their lives decreased with each successive minute of travel

item.title: Think you'd hand in your notice if you suddenly struck it rich?
item.dc:creator: magazinethemes
item.content:encoded:
When Keith, a Silicon Valley entrepreneur, worked at a technology company that went public, he became rich overnight. He was sure he’d never need to work again. His pay-out from the initial public offering was well into the “tens of millions” of dollars, he says, a life-changing amount. It gave him the type of financial security that most of us can only dream of.

Image with share buttons

[share][/share] A lot of people neglect accessories, especially things like scarves, watches and jewelry. To some extent, men see it as feminine, which is wrong. Scarves are practical, they keep you warm. Watches are practical and beautiful. Jewelry, well… let’s just say it depends. [ad type=custom-ad-2] Watches are to men what stilettos are to women. Or well, they used to be. Their main purpose is after all to show the time, and your smartphone does just that, and is most likely in your hand just as often as your watch is on your arm. Nonetheless, watches are beautiful. Try and get your hands on a quality watch, from a well known brand.
